tasks.gen-cov: rm -rf .cov_profile && deno test --ignore=tmp,exemple,.cov_profile --coverage=.cov_profile -A && deno coverage .cov_profile --lcov  > .cov_profile/cov_profile.lcov && genhtml -o .cov_profile/html .cov_profile/cov_profile.lcov
tasks.pre-commit: deno task fmt --check && deno task lint && deno task test && deno task check
tasks.update-changelog: conventional-changelog -p conventionalcommits --same-file -i CHANGELOG.md -k deno.json && deno task fmt
